name: List
description: A list box or dropdown list for choosing an option from.

conditions.name: Compare selection
conditions.description: Compare the index of the currently selected item.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Select how to compare the current selection.

params.name: Index
params.description: The index of the selected item to compare to.

conditions.name: On selection changed
conditions.description: Triggered when the selected item changes.

conditions.name: On clicked
conditions.description: Triggered when the list is clicked.

conditions.name: On double-clicked
conditions.description: Triggered when the list is double-clicked.

conditions.name: Compare selected item text
conditions.description: Compare the text of the currently selected item.

params.name: Text to compare
params.description: Enter the text to compare with the selected item's text.

params.name: Case sensitivity
params.description: Choose whether capital letters count as different to lowercase.  If ignoring case, "ABC" matches "abc".

conditions.name: Compare item text at
conditions.description: Compare the text of an item in the list.

params.name: Index
params.description: The zero-based index of the item text to compare with.

params.name: Text to compare
params.description: Enter the text to compare with the item's text.

params.name: Case sensitivity
params.description: Choose whether capital letters count as different to lowercase.  If ignoring case, "ABC" matches "abc".

actions.name: Set selection
actions.description: Select an item in the list.

params.name: Index
params.description: The zero-based index of the item to select.

actions.name: Add item
actions.description: Append a new item to the list.

actions.name: Add item at
actions.description: Append a new item to a specific place in the list.

params.name: Index
params.description: The zero-based index of the item to insert before.

actions.name: Remove
actions.description: Remove an item from the list.

params.name: Index
params.description: The zero-based index of the item to remove.

actions.name: Set item text
actions.description: Set the text of an item in the list.

params.name: Index
params.description: The zero-based index of the item to change.

actions.name: Clear
actions.description: Remove all items from the list.

params.name: Tooltip
params.description: The tooltip to set on the list.

expressions.name: ItemCount
expressions.description: The number of items in the list.

expressions.name: SelectedIndex
expressions.description: The zero-based index of the currently selected item.

expressions.name: SelectedText
expressions.description: The text of the currently selected item.

expressions.name: SelectedCount
expressions.description: In a multi-select list box, the number of currently selected items.

expressions.name: SelectedIndexAt
expressions.description: In a multi-select list box, the index of the Nth selected item.

params.name: Index
params.description: Selected item number to get index from.

expressions.name: SelectedTextAt
expressions.description: In a multi-select list box, the text of the Nth selected item.

params.name: Index
params.description: Selected item number to get text from.

expressions.name: ItemTextAt
expressions.description: The text of the Nth item in the list.

params.name: Index
params.description: Item number to get text from.
